    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    private void
    initialize()
    initialize is called on startup and sets visibility and values of the listOfStates and the pieChart, which have to be handled through initialize otherwise errors occur
    void
    initImageURL()
    initImageURL sets up the URL that generates the map in the bottom left corner of the window.
    private void
    onDemSelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    onDemSelected takes in an ActionEvent and puts a new vote into the vote Hashmap.
    private void
    onDropdown()
    onDropdown updates the votes and makes sure if a vote is already selected for a state, it will appear if select it again.
    private void
    onRepSelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    onRepSelected takes in an ActionEvent and puts a new vote into the vote Hashmap.
    private void
    onUndSelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    onUndSelected takes in an ActionEvent and puts a new vote into the vote Hashmap.
    void
    updateImageURL()
    updateImageURL is called every time a state is voted for, and updates the current URL with a new URL generated to accomodate the newly voted on state.
    private void
    updateVoteCounter()
    updateVoteCounter updates the labels that contain the current total of points in the election.
    private void
    whoWonState()
    whoWonState determines a winner of the election once votes exceed 270.

  • Constructor Details

    • CollegeController

      public CollegeController() throws MalformedURLException
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      initialize is called on startup and sets visibility and values of the listOfStates and the pieChart, which have to be handled through initialize otherwise errors occur

    • initImageURL

      public void initImageURL()
      initImageURL sets up the URL that generates the map in the bottom left corner of the window.

    • updateImageURL

      public void updateImageURL() throws MalformedURLException
      updateImageURL is called every time a state is voted for, and updates the current URL with a new URL generated to accomodate the newly voted on state.
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException

    • onDropdown

      private void onDropdown()
      onDropdown updates the votes and makes sure if a vote is already selected for a state, it will appear if select it again.

    • onDemSelected

      private void onDemSelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws MalformedURLException
      onDemSelected takes in an ActionEvent and puts a new vote into the vote Hashmap. it also updates the VoteCounter and updates the voting map
      Parameters:
      event - from clicking on a radiobutton
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException

    • onRepSelected

      private void onRepSelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws MalformedURLException
      onRepSelected takes in an ActionEvent and puts a new vote into the vote Hashmap. it also updates the VoteCounter and updates the voting map
      Parameters:
      event - from clicking on a radiobutton
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException

    • onUndSelected

      private void onUndSelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws MalformedURLException
      onUndSelected takes in an ActionEvent and puts a new vote into the vote Hashmap. it also updates the VoteCounter and updates the voting map
      Parameters:
      event - from clicking on a radiobutton
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException

    • updateVoteCounter

      private void updateVoteCounter()
      updateVoteCounter updates the labels that contain the current total of points in the election. It also updates the piechart and checks for a winner of the election.

    • whoWonState

      private void whoWonState()
      whoWonState determines a winner of the election once votes exceed 270. It is called whenever the vote counter is updated
